content.rendered:
Mobile Banking

Banking on the Go – Mobile App

As a StarConnect Plus™ online banking user, you have access to Westamerica’s mobile banking service. Our mobile banking app makes it simple for you to check your money any time so you can safeguard your finances and enjoy peace of mind knowing your money is always at your fingertips.

It’s the quick and easy way to:

  • Check your balances
  • Transfer money between your Westamerica accounts
  • Pay your bills with our Bill Pay service
  • Monitor your transactions
  • Deposit checks

Simply use the same login and password you have for your account and start enjoying the freedom of banking from your mobile device.

Alerts

StarConnect Plus users can also take advantage of our free message service which sends you important alerts to help you stay in control of your finances.

Set up your preferences today to get alerts for activity such as:

  • Large withdrawal amounts
  • Low funds notifications
  • Weekly balance updates

To activate your alerts, simply log in to StarConnect Plus from your desktop, go to “Additional Services” and select “Mobile Banking and Alerts.”

Westamerica gives you the freedom to manage your money wherever you go.

Not a StarConnect Plus user? Enroll today!

Download Mobile App
